channel.title: Semi-Decent Suggestion!
channel.description:
Ok guys, as you all know there are many people who use hamachi, and many who don't.
I was thinking it would be VERY logical to add something small. It would be something that would go through a layout.
It would be the tag [HAM] or [No-HAM] in the topic subject.
One example:
[center][b][HAM] M0p4rsc4p3 Version 6![/b] [/center]
This would be for the server advertisement topics.
Please take this into consideration as it is very annoying clicking topics and finding out they are Hamachi.
Thanks alot!!
~Due

item.title: Semi-Decent Suggestion!
item.dc:creator: @Due_Pwn Due Pwn
item.description:
@Due_Pwn wrote:

I guess they aren’t going to put it back. That’s ok, thanks for the reply, fr33sc4p3.

Read full topic

Ok guys, as you all know there are many people who use hamachi, and many who don’t.

I was thinking it would be VERY logical to add something small. It would be something that would go through a layout.
